pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, May 17, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks during the closing session of the Global Conference for the Rights and Inclusion of LGBTI+ Youth.

The conference will be streamed live via the following link: https://youtu.be/k2DsKBlFv6s.

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister, joined by the Minister of Natural Resources Seamus O'Regan and the Minister of Employment, Workforce Development and Disability Inclusion Carla Qualtrough, will participate in a virtual announcement on energy efficiency and affordability for the middle class.

The announcement will be streamed live via the following link: https://www.youtube.com/user/naturalresourcesca.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.
